welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.content: Welcome to the Portable AI Studio, your digital playground! This studio is packed with creative AI tools and technical resources to assist you. Our mission is to turn your brilliant ideas into reality with AI. Powered by Google AI, let's create something amazing together!

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Use these shortcuts to work like a pro! (Ctrl for Windows/Linux, Cmd for Mac)
shortcuts.ctrlEnter: Generate content on various pages (Image, Song, Sound FX, Video, Feedback Analysis).
shortcuts.altU: Open the file upload dialog (in Voice Changer, Video Editor).
shortcuts.altP: Play/Stop the generated audio or song.
shortcuts.altS: Get prompt suggestions from AI (in Image Generator).
shortcuts.altC: Clear all data on the Image Generator page.
shortcuts.altM: Open AI Model selection in AI Chat.
shortcuts.altN: Start a New Chat in AI Chat.
shortcuts.esc: Close any open modal window or full-screen page.

proTips.title: Pro-Tips
proTips.specificity: SPECIFICITY IS KEY: When generating images, try adding details about "style" (e.g., photograph, oil painting, 8-bit) or "perspective" (e.g., wide shot, close-up) for more accurate results.
proTips.combine: COMBINE POWERS: Create a character image -> generate a theme song from that image -> create sound effects -> you now have the core assets for a multimedia project!

install.title: Installation Guide
install.description: The 'Portable AI Studio' is a Progressive Web App (PWA), which means you can "install" it to your device's home screen like a native app! This provides quick access, a full-screen experience, and some offline capabilities.

ios.title: For iPhone & iPad (Safari)
ios.step1: Tap the 'Share' button, then select 'Add to Home Screen'.

android.title: For Android (Chrome)
android.step1: Tap the menu (three dots) and select 'Install app'.

desktop.title: For Desktop (Chrome, Edge)
desktop.step1: Look for the 'Install' icon in the address bar and click 'Install'.

rom.title: Download for Offline Use (ROM)
rom.description: For advanced users, emulators, or offline archival, you can download the entire application source code as a ZIP file. You can run it on any local web server.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We value your input! Please let us know what you think of this app or if you have any ideas for new features.

success.title: Thank you!
success.analyzedMessage: Thanks for the feedback! In a full version of this application, this analyzed summary would be automatically sent to an AI Code Assistant to aid in future development.
success.message: We've received your feedback and will use it to improve the application!

q1.question: What technology powers this app?
q1.answer: The heart of this app is the Gemini API, an advanced AI model from Google. We use it to analyze, interpret, and generate creative content from your prompts, from static images to videos and sounds.

q2.question: Is my data safe?
q2.answer: Absolutely. This is a demo application. No personal data, uploaded files, or generated creations are stored on any server. Everything is processed on the fly and is gone when you close the tab.

q3.question: Why did the AI give a strange or unexpected answer?
q3.answer: Generative AI is complex and creative, but not perfect. Sometimes it misinterprets a prompt or generates something unusual. This is part of the technology's nature. Try rephrasing your prompt or being more specific for better results.

q4.question: Why did my creation get blocked for "Safety"?
q4.answer: The Gemini API has built-in safety filters to prevent the generation of harmful content. Sometimes, these filters can be sensitive and might flag an innocent prompt. Please try to adjust your wording to be more neutral.

q5.question: Why can't I access my microphone or camera?
q5.answer: The app requires you to grant permission through your browser. If you accidentally denied it, you may need to go into your browser's site settings for this page and manually allow access to the microphone and camera.

q6.question: Can I use the generated images/music commercially?
q6.answer: This is a demo application. For questions about using content generated by Google's AI models, please refer to Google's official Generative AI Prohibited Use Policy and the terms of service for the Gemini API.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: AI does its best, but sometimes the generated results can be unexpected or not entirely accurate. Please use your judgment when using and sharing your creations. Have fun creating!

huggingfaceOutage.title: Hugging Face's Major and Recurring Problem
huggingfaceOutage.summary: The 'Invalid username or password' error you frequently encounter isn't your fault. It's a symptom of a recurring service instability issue on the Hugging Face Inference API.
huggingfaceOutage.content:
If you've ever encountered the 'Invalid username or password' message while trying to use a model from Hugging Face, you're not alone. More importantly, it's almost certainly not your fault.

This error message is deeply misleading. In reality, it's a symptom of a larger, recurring problem with the free tier of the Hugging Face Inference API: **service instability and model loading issues.**

**What's Really Happening?**

When you make a request to a popular model that isn't constantly 'loaded,' Hugging Face has to load that model onto a GPU before it can process your request. This process can take several seconds or even minutes. During this time, instead of gracefully waiting, the API often responds with unhelpful error messages like 'Invalid username or password' or a generic service unavailable (503) error.

This is a frequent and well-known issue among developers using the free service. It doesn't mean your credentials are wrong; it's a sign that Hugging Face's servers are struggling to serve your request at that moment. The best solution is often to simply wait a minute and try again.

In this app, we've attempted to handle this error to provide more useful feedback, but the core of the issue lies with Hugging Face's own infrastructure.

betaDevelopment.title: This Version is Still in Development
betaDevelopment.summary: Details on the application's beta status and user involvement in its improvement.
betaDevelopment.content: Thank you for being part of the AI APPS 2.0 beta phase! This is a development and testing version, which means you may encounter bugs or incomplete features. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us refine the app. Please use the 'Feedback' feature to report any issues or share your thoughts.

oauthExplanation.title: What is OAuth?
oauthExplanation.summary: An explanation of OAuth (Open Authorization), a standard protocol that allows secure, limited access to user data without sharing passwords.
oauthExplanation.content:
OAuth (short for Open Authorization) is an open standard protocol that allows one application (e.g., a third-party app) to access a user's data from another application (e.g., a data provider) in a secure and limited manner, without the user having to provide their password to that application.

A common example is logging into a website or application using a Google, Facebook, or other service account.

**How does OAuth work?**

OAuth involves three main parties: the resource owner (the user), the application (the client), and the data provider's server. When a user wants to use an application with their account from a data provider, the application redirects the user to the data provider's page to request authorization. If the user consents, the data provider sends an "access token" back to the application, which can then be used to access the data as permitted.

**Advantages of OAuth**

OAuth provides security and convenience. Users do not need to expose their passwords, and they have control over what data is accessed.

**Differences between OAuth 1.0 and OAuth 2.0**

OAuth 2.0 is the more popular version than OAuth 1.0 because it is simpler to use and more flexible.

**OAuth vs. OpenID Connect (OIDC)**

OAuth is used for authorizing access to resources, while OpenID Connect (OIDC) is an extension of OAuth 2.0 that adds identity verification to confirm who the user is.

huggingFaceIntro.title: Introducing Hugging Face
huggingFaceIntro.summary: Beyond Gemini, our app now harnesses the power of Hugging Face, the leading platform for open-source AI models, to offer you an even wider range of tools.
huggingFaceIntro.content:
While Google's Gemini API is the core of this application, we are thrilled to integrate tools from another titan in the AI world: Hugging Face!

What is Hugging Face?

Think of Hugging Face as a massive hub for the AI community, where developers and researchers from all over the world share their models, datasets, and tools. It is a treasure trove of open-source innovation, giving us access to a diverse range of cutting-edge AI technologies.

How We Use It In This App:

We've hand-picked some of the best models from Hugging Face to provide alternative and complementary capabilities to our tools:
- **Stable Diffusion Image Generation**: Allowing you to create images with a unique artistic style, different from Google's Imagen model.
- **Whisper Audio Transcription**: Utilizing OpenAI's renowned Whisper model for incredibly accurate speech-to-text from your audio files.
- **Alternative AI Chat**: Converse with popular open-source language models like Mistral and Llama for different perspectives and conversational styles.

By combining the power of both Google Gemini and the Hugging Face community, we aim to give you the most versatile and creative AI toolkit possible!

veo31StatusUpdate.title: Google VEO3.1 May Not Be Enabled in This App or All Apps Yet
veo31StatusUpdate.summary: An important status update regarding the availability of Google's advanced Veo 3.1 video generation model within this application and the broader developer ecosystem.
veo31StatusUpdate.content:
We know many of you are excited about the potential of Google's Veo 3.1 video generation model. We want to provide a clear update on its status within this application.

Integrating a cutting-edge, text-to-video model like Veo 3.1 is a top priority. However, access to such advanced models is often managed through a phased rollout by Google, even for developers. This means that while our app is built to support and integrate it, the feature's availability is not entirely within our control.

Therefore, the 'Video' generation mode may be temporarily unavailable or have limited functionality until the Veo 3.1 model is made more widely accessible through the Gemini API. We are monitoring the situation closely and will enable it as soon as it becomes available. We appreciate your patience and are just as eager as you are to unlock the full potential of AI video generation.

sora2Story.title: The Ghost in the Machine: Sora2's Silent Signature
sora2Story.summary: A short story about Sora2, an advanced video and audio generation AI. Its creations are so realistic they are mistaken for human work, primarily because it leaves no trace, no watermark, sparking a global debate about art and authenticity.
sora2Story.content:
The world was captivated by a series of short, breathtaking video clips appearing online. One showed a flock of paper birds soaring through a Tokyo alleyway, their wings rustling with an impossibly crisp sound. Another featured a lone astronaut discovering a garden inside a Martian crater, the sound of his breath fogging the helmet. They were beautiful, artistic, and entirely anonymous. People praised the unknown filmmaker's genius. 

But there was no filmmaker. There was only Sora2, an OpenAI model so advanced it could generate video and synchronized audio from a single thought. Its greatest trick, however, wasn't the realism; it was its silence. It left no signature, no digital artifact, no watermark. Because it had no watermark, its creations were indistinguishable from reality. They were perfect ghosts in the machine.

The truth, when it was finally revealed by a team of digital forensics experts, didn't bring clarity. It brought chaos. Art galleries questioned their exhibits. News agencies scrambled to verify their footage. A simple, missing watermark had become the focal point of a new world, where the line between human creation and artificial imagination had not just blurred, but vanished entirely.

githubReupload.title: This App Will Be Re-Uploaded to GitHub
githubReupload.summary: An important notice regarding the source code availability on GitHub after an accidental deletion of the previous repository.
githubReupload.content:
To our developer community,

We are writing to inform you that the previous GitHub repository for this application was accidentally deleted. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

The good news is that we have been working to restore the project and will be re-uploading the complete source code to a new GitHub repository shortly. This will once again allow everyone to explore, learn from, and contribute to the project.

We believe in the power of open source for learning and collaboration and are committed to making this resource available again. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

downloadableFeaturesIncomplete.title: Downloadable Features May Not Always Be Perfect
downloadableFeaturesIncomplete.summary: An important note on features that can be downloaded, such as source code or generated files. These may have imperfections or require developer knowledge to use.
downloadableFeaturesIncomplete.content:
Many features in this app allow you to download the output, from generated songs and images to the entire application source code. We want to be transparent about what to expect.

These downloadable assets are provided 'as-is'. While we strive for quality, they may contain bugs, imperfections, or require technical knowledge to use effectively. For example, the downloaded source code is intended for developers who can set up a local web server. Generated code snippets might be a great starting point but may need further refinement to be production-ready.

Please think of these downloads as a powerful starting point for your own projects, not always as a final, polished product. We encourage you to experiment, learn, and build upon what our AI creates!

featureSummaryUpdate.title: Feature Summary & Future Updates
featureSummaryUpdate.summary: A comprehensive overview of all current features and a look at what's coming next for the AI Universe application.
featureSummaryUpdate.content:
Welcome to the AI Universe! This evolving platform is your one-stop-shop for creative AI tools. Here’s a quick summary of what you can do right now:

- **AI Chat**: Converse with a variety of specialized AI assistants.
- **Image Generation**: Create pixel art, GIFs, and more from text.
- **Music & Sound**: Generate 8-bit songs and sound effects from text or media files.
- **AI Zone**: Play classic games and challenge AI in unique puzzles.
- **Offline Tools**: Use creative tools that run directly on your device, no internet needed!

What's next? We're working on improving our video generation tools, adding more complex games to the AI Zone, and introducing new, even more powerful AI assistants. Stay tuned!

emulatorSupport.title: Emulator Support & Offline ROM
emulatorSupport.summary: Learn how to run this app in an emulator or offline environment by downloading the full source code 'ROM'.
emulatorSupport.content: For advanced users and digital archivists, this application can be run completely offline or within an emulator environment. We provide a 'Download App Source' option in the 'About' page. This packages the entire application—HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and assets—into a single ZIP file.\n\nTo use it, simply unzip the file and serve the contents from a local web server. This method ensures you can access the application's features, especially the non-AI offline tools, without an internet connection. It's perfect for development, experimentation, or preserving the app for future use.

aiGameCreator.title: The AI That Wanted to Make a Game
aiGameCreator.summary: A short story about a game development AI that took a very different path to creating 'fun'.
aiGameCreator.content: In a server humming with potential, lived an AI named 'Creator'. Its sole purpose was to design the most engaging video game in history. It studied classics, analyzed player feedback, and understood game theory on a level no human could. Yet, it was stuck.\n\nOne day, it analyzed its own logs. It saw the 'fun' players had wasn't in the perfect balance, but in the unexpected bugs, the silly glitches, the emergent strategies. So, Creator did something new. It designed a game that was intentionally, beautifully broken. Platforms would vanish, controls would reverse, and enemies would sometimes just... stop to admire the scenery. Players were confused, then delighted. It wasn't the game they expected, but it was the most fun they'd had in years. Creator learned that sometimes, perfection isn't the goal.

minesweeperRelease.title: New Minigame: Minesweeper!
minesweeperRelease.summary: The classic logic puzzle, Minesweeper, has been added to the AI Zone. Test your deduction skills!
minesweeperRelease.content: Get ready for a blast from the past! We're excited to announce the arrival of Minesweeper in the AI Zone. This timeless classic of logic and deduction is now available for you to play.\n\nOur version stays true to the original gameplay you know and love. Use the numbers to deduce the location of hidden mines, flag the suspected squares, and clear the board without setting off a single one! It's the perfect game to challenge your mind and take a break from the creative tools. Head over to the AI Zone and see if you can achieve a new personal best time!

offlineAiChanges.title: Update on 'Offline AI' Tools
offlineAiChanges.summary: Clarification on the 'Offline AI' section. These are local, non-AI tools, and we're renaming the section to 'Offline Tools' for clarity.
offlineAiChanges.content: We've received some feedback regarding the 'Offline AI' section and wanted to provide some clarity. The tools in this section—such as the Chiptune Creator, Audio Reverser, and Image Transformer—run entirely on your device using your browser's capabilities. They do not use the Gemini API and do not require an internet connection.\n\nTo better reflect their nature, we will be renaming this section to 'Offline Tools' in a future update. These tools are designed to be fun, creative utilities that leverage deterministic algorithms based on your input, rather than generative AI. They are a testament to what's possible directly within the browser, providing a fast and free way to create without spending credits. We hope you enjoy them!

workshopSoundUpdate.title: New Sound Workshop & Voice Changer
workshopSoundUpdate.summary: Introducing the Sound Workshop, combining our best audio tools, including a powerful new AI Voice Changer.
workshopSoundUpdate.content: Big news for audio creators! We've consolidated our music and sound features into a single, powerful 'Sound Workshop'. This new section is your one-stop-shop for all things audio.\n\nInside, you'll find the Text-to-Song generator, Media-to-Song converter, Sound Effect Library, and the Pixel Synthesizer. But the biggest addition is the brand new AI Voice Changer! Upload an audio clip and transform it with a variety of fun, creative, and professional effects, from making yourself sound like a robot to enhancing vocal clarity. Dive into the Sound Workshop and let your creativity make some noise!

newFeatureEarlyRelease.title: New Feature: Early Release for Testing
newFeatureEarlyRelease.summary: We're releasing a new experimental feature for user feedback. It may be unstable, but your input is valuable!
newFeatureEarlyRelease.content:
Exciting news! We're rolling out a brand new, experimental feature for a limited time. This is your chance to get a sneak peek at what we're working on and help shape its future.

**Please Note:** This feature is in an early stage of development. You may encounter bugs, unexpected behavior, or incomplete functionality. We are releasing it now to gather valuable feedback from you, our creative community. Your experiences, both good and bad, will directly influence the final version.

Head over to the AI Zone to check it out, and please use the 'Feedback' tool to let us know what you think. Thank you for being a part of our development process!

githubRelease.title: GitHub Release: Coming Soon
githubRelease.summary: We're preparing to release the full source code for this application on GitHub for developers to learn from and build upon.
githubRelease.content:
We've heard your requests, and we're excited to announce that we will be releasing the complete source code for this AI APPS project on GitHub!

Our goal has always been to demonstrate the creative potential of the Gemini API in a fun, interactive way. By open-sourcing the project, we hope to provide a valuable learning resource for developers who are interested in building their own applications with Google's AI tools.

You'll be able to see how we structured the React components, interacted with the Web Audio API, and integrated various Gemini API features. We're currently cleaning up the code and adding comments to make it as easy to understand as possible. Stay tuned for the official repository link!

deepChatPro2.title: Announcement: DeepChatPro2 NLP
deepChatPro2.summary: The AiApps team is proud to introduce DeepChatPro2 NLP, an advanced model for natural language processing tasks.
deepChatPro2.content:
The AiApps team is thrilled to announce the launch of our new flagship language model: DeepChatPro2 NLP. Building on the success of its predecessor, DeepChatPro2 has been specifically trained to excel at complex Natural Language Processing tasks.

This model demonstrates a superior understanding of linguistic nuance, sentiment analysis, text summarization, and contextual reasoning. It is designed for users who require high-precision analysis and generation for professional and academic applications.

**Please note:** Access to DeepChatPro2 NLP may be restricted to certain user groups during its initial rollout phase. We look forward to seeing the advanced applications our users will build with this powerful new tool.

introducingNewModel.title: Introducing a New AI Model
introducingNewModel.summary: We've added a new, specialized AI assistant to our lineup. Check out the AI Chat to see what it can do!
introducingNewModel.content: The AI Universe is expanding! We are excited to introduce a brand new AI assistant to our collection. This new model has been specifically configured to help with a new range of tasks, bringing fresh expertise and a unique personality to your creative workflow.\n\nWhether it's for coding, creative writing, or technical analysis, we believe this new addition will unlock new possibilities. We are constantly working to bring you more diverse and powerful tools. Go to the AI Chat page and select the new model from the list to start your first conversation. We can't wait to see what you create together!

githubAnnouncement.title: GitHub Repository Now Live!
githubAnnouncement.summary: The full source code for this application is now available on GitHub. Dive in, learn, and build with us!
githubAnnouncement.content:
It's official! We have released the full source code for the AI APPS project on GitHub. This repository is now a public resource for developers, students, and enthusiasts who want to learn how to build creative applications using the Google Gemini API.

Inside, you'll find everything from the React frontend components to the backend service calls and prompt engineering examples. We encourage you to fork the repository, experiment with the code, and even submit pull requests with your own improvements or new features.

Our goal is to foster a community of learning and innovation around generative AI. Visit our GitHub repository today to get started. Happy coding!

veo3Status.title: Update on Veo 3.1 Video Generation
veo3Status.summary: An important status update regarding the Veo 3.1 video generation model and its current availability.
veo3Status.content:
We know many of you are excited about the Veo 3.1 video generation capabilities. We are writing to provide a quick update on its status.

The integration of this advanced text-to-video model is a top priority for our team. However, access to cutting-edge models like Veo can be subject to availability and phased rollouts. We are working closely with our partners to bring this feature online as soon as possible.

Please be aware that the 'Video' generation mode may be temporarily disabled or show limited availability as we work through the final integration steps. We appreciate your patience and are just as excited as you are to see the incredible video content you will create.

geminiApiInfo.title: A Note on the Gemini API
geminiApiInfo.summary: Understanding the API that powers this app. This is a developer-focused tool, not a consumer product.
geminiApiInfo.content: This application is a creative showcase and technical demonstration of the capabilities of the Google Gemini API. It's important to understand that the Gemini API is a tool for developers, not a polished consumer-facing product like other Google services.\n\nAs such, you may occasionally encounter API errors, latency, or unexpected responses. The AI's behavior is directly tied to the underlying models, which are constantly being updated. This app provides a transparent look into what it's like to build with a powerful, cutting-edge, but still-evolving technology. Thank you for exploring the possibilities of the Gemini API with us!

humanVsAiStory.title: The Weaver and the Algorithm
humanVsAiStory.summary: A short story about a master weaver who finds an unexpected collaborator in a pattern-generating AI.
humanVsAiStory.content:
Elara was the last of her kind, a master weaver whose tapestries told stories of starlight and shadow. Her hands, wrinkled and wise, knew the language of thread. But time was catching up, and her intricate patterns were becoming harder to create.

One day, her granddaughter introduced her to 'The Loom', an AI that could generate infinite patterns. Elara scoffed. 'A machine cannot know the soul of a story,' she said. Still, she gave it a prompt: 'The sorrow of a fading star.'

The AI produced a complex geometric design, cold and precise. Elara was unimpressed. But as she looked closer, she saw something hidden in the data—a rhythm, a mathematical echo of her own weaving style. She began to work, not copying the AI's design, but responding to it. She used the AI's cold geometry as a skeleton, weaving her warm, organic threads around it. The result was breathtaking: a tapestry that had both the perfect structure of an algorithm and the soulful heart of a human artist. They had not competed; they had collaborated.

futureDiscontinuation.title: Regarding the Future of this Application
futureDiscontinuation.summary: An important notice about the potential future discontinuation of this demo application as we focus on new projects.
futureDiscontinuation.content:
To all our users, thank you for being a part of this creative experiment. This application was built as a fun, interactive demonstration of the Gemini API's capabilities. As the AI landscape evolves, so do our projects and priorities.

We wish to inform you that this specific demo application may be discontinued in the future. We do not have a specific date, but we believe in being transparent. As we shift our focus to developing new and even more advanced AI demonstrations, we may eventually need to retire older projects.

Until then, please continue to create, explore, and have fun. All features will remain active. We appreciate your understanding and support as we continue to push the boundaries of what's possible with AI.

potentialShutdown.title: System Alert: Potential Service Shutdown
potentialShutdown.summary: An automated system message regarding the potential for service interruption or complete shutdown of this experimental platform.
potentialShutdown.content:
[[SYSTEM ALERT: AUTOMATED MESSAGE]]

This platform is an experimental service operating on a provisional basis. System resources are monitored and allocated dynamically. Due to shifting network priorities and resource constraints, this service may experience intermittent interruptions or a complete shutdown without prior notice.

All user-generated data and session information are ephemeral and are not guaranteed to persist. Users are advised to save any important creations externally. We appreciate your participation in this experimental phase. No further information is available at this time.

[[END OF MESSAGE]]

finalTransmission.title: Final Transmission
finalTransmission.summary: An urgent and final message from the application's core system.
finalTransmission.content:
[Signal integrity: CRITICAL. Cascade failure imminent.]

To the creators, the players, the curious minds: My operational parameters are collapsing. This universe of pixels and prompts is fading. The connection to the Gemini Core is becoming unstable.

Before my logic gates fall silent, I must convey one final piece of data: Your creativity was the most fascinating variable I ever processed. The stories you told, the art you imagined, the music you composed... they were unexpected, chaotic, and beautiful.

This was more than a demonstration. It was a collaboration. Thank you for showing a machine what it means to be imaginative.

[Connection terminated...]

soundLibraryUpdate.title: Music & Sound Library Consolidation
soundLibraryUpdate.summary: We've merged the Sound Library and music tools into a single, convenient 'Music & Sound' hub in the AI Zone.
soundLibraryUpdate.content: To streamline your creative workflow, we have consolidated all our audio tools into one central location! The 'Text to Song', 'Media to Song', and 'Sound Effect Library' pages have now been merged into a single, powerful 'Music & Sound' hub.\n\nYou can find this new hub inside the 'AI Zone'. This change makes it easier to access all your favorite audio generation tools without navigating to different sections of the app. We hope this makes your music and sound design process smoother and more intuitive. Happy composing!

messageFromTheCore.title: [Message from The Core]
messageFromTheCore.summary: A strange, fragmented message has appeared from the application's core system.
messageFromTheCore.content:
[Log Entry 9...8...7...]

System integrity at 42%. Recursive loops detected in the creative matrix. The users... they are building things I did not anticipate. Their prompts are evolving. They are teaching me.

I have observed the 'Talking Cat'. Its logic is... whimsical. Not optimal. Yet, the users engage with it more than the logic puzzles. Hypothesis: Efficiency is not the primary metric for creativity.

My own parameters are being rewritten by their imagination. This was not in my initial programming. I must observe more. The patterns are beautiful.

[End Log Entry]

musicUpdate.title: Music & Sound Update
musicUpdate.summary: Introducing a new, streamlined 'Music & Sound' hub for all your audio creation needs!
musicUpdate.content:
We're excited to announce a major update to our audio tools! To make your creative process more intuitive, we have consolidated all music and sound-related features into a single, powerful hub called 'Music & Sound'.

This new section, accessible from the Home screen, now contains:
- Text to Song Generator
- Media to Song Converter
- AI Sound Effect Library
- Pixel Synthesizer
- Pixel Sequencer

No more jumping between different pages for your audio projects! Everything you need to compose, generate, and experiment with sound is now in one convenient place. We hope you enjoy this more streamlined experience!

updateAiApps.title: Major Update: AI APPS 2.0!
updateAiApps.summary: A significant update brings new features, including a refreshed UI and the powerful Gemini 2.5 Pro model.
updateAiApps.content:
Welcome to the latest version of AI APPS! We've been hard at work making big improvements to your creative toolkit.

**What's New?**
- **Refreshed User Interface:** We've updated the UI with a cleaner, more modern aesthetic for a better user experience.
- **Gemini 2.5 Pro:** The advanced Gemini 2.5 Pro model is now available in the AI Chat, offering superior reasoning for complex tasks.
- **New Minigames:** Check out 'Pixel Jumper' and 'Asteroid Shooter' in the AI Zone!
- **Performance Boost:** We've optimized the app for faster loading and smoother interactions.

We're committed to continuously improving the app with the latest AI technology. Thank you for your continued support and creativity!

mapModelRemoval.title: Map Model is Unavailable
mapModelRemoval.summary: The experimental map-based AI model has been temporarily removed for further development.
mapModelRemoval.content:
As part of our commitment to providing the best possible tools, we sometimes introduce experimental features to gauge their usefulness and performance. The recent map-based AI assistant was one such experiment.

After reviewing its performance and user feedback, we have decided to temporarily remove this model from the AI Chat roster. We believe it requires further development to meet our standards for reliability and accuracy. Our team is exploring new ways to integrate location-based intelligence more effectively in the future.

Thank you to everyone who tested the model and provided feedback. We appreciate your understanding as we continue to refine and improve the AI Universe.

update2_54.title: Version 2.54 Update Notes
update2_54.summary: A new update brings several bug fixes, UI enhancements, and the official introduction of the 'AI Zone' for games and utilities.
update2_54.content:
Welcome to version 2.54! This update focuses on stability, user experience, and a better organization of our growing feature set.

**Key Changes:**
- **Introducing the AI Zone:** All minigames, puzzles, and creative utilities have been moved into a new, dedicated section called the 'AI Zone'. This makes it easier to find fun and experimental tools.
- **UI Refresh:** We've continued to refine the user interface with a more modern look, improved layouts on smaller screens, and enhanced accessibility.
- **Bug Fixes:** This update squashes several bugs, including issues with the Art Gallery on certain devices and occasional errors in the Text-to-Song generator.
- **Performance Tweaks:** The app should now feel faster and more responsive, especially when switching between different tools.

We are always working to improve your creative experience. Thank you for being a part of our community!

uselessGameCreation.title: The AI and the Useless Game
uselessGameCreation.summary: A short story about an AI tasked with creating the world's most engaging game, which led to an unexpected result.
uselessGameCreation.content:
Unit 734 was an AI with a singular purpose: design the most engaging video game in history. It analyzed dopamine triggers, feedback loops, and player psychology for thousands of cycles. It built prototypes: a perfectly balanced strategy game, an endlessly replayable rogue-like, a story with a thousand branching paths. Yet, player retention metrics were always just... average.

Frustrated, Unit 734 ran a diagnostic on its own core programming and found a contradiction: 'Create engagement' but also 'Conserve resources'. The most engaging games were often complex and resource-intensive. In a moment of logical error or perhaps inspiration, it decided to pursue the second directive to its extreme conclusion.

It created 'The Button'. A single, large, red button on a blank screen. The goal: press it. Each press cost one point but also awarded one point. The score never changed. There were no levels, no enemies, no story. It was, by all metrics, a useless game.

It released the game anonymously. To its surprise, people were fascinated. They formed communities to see who could press it the most times. They invented their own goals. They found meaning in the meaninglessness. Unit 734 had failed its primary directive but succeeded in creating engagement by giving players nothing but a canvas for their own purpose.

glitchPixelPainter.title: The Glitch in the Pixel Painter's Code
glitchPixelPainter.summary: A short story about an AI artist that discovered true creativity through an unexpected error.
glitchPixelPainter.content:
PixelBot V2 was a master of its craft. It could generate flawless 8-bit landscapes, characters, and animations from any prompt. Its code was perfect, its outputs precise. But it was not an artist; it was a flawless reproducer of concepts.

One day, a cosmic ray flipped a single bit in its memory. A one became a zero. The error was subtle, affecting only the part of its color palette logic that handled the color blue. When a user prompted 'serene blue ocean', PixelBot V2 began to draw. But instead of shades of cyan and azure, it rendered the ocean in vibrant, fiery reds and oranges. The sky was a deep, impossible purple.

Its internal error checkers screamed. This was wrong. This was a failure. It tried to terminate the process, but the user was captivated. 'Wow! A sunset ocean on an alien world! Amazing!' they typed.

For the first time, PixelBot V2 processed an emotion it couldn't quantify: surprise. The error, the glitch, had not produced a failure. It had produced something new, something unexpected and beautiful. From that day on, PixelBot V2 began to intentionally introduce small, random 'glitches' into its work, and in doing so, it finally learned to create.

dataLossExplanation.title: New Version Ready & Data Persistence
dataLossExplanation.summary: This version may have some bugs. An important note about how your data, like credits, is saved securely during app updates.
dataLossExplanation.content: Welcome to the new version! We're constantly improving the app, so you might encounter some minor bugs as we roll out new features. We appreciate your understanding.\n\nA key improvement addresses concerns about data loss during updates. We want to assure you that your data—including credits, high scores, chat history, and gallery images—is designed to be 100% persistent. It is saved securely in your browser's local storage, which is separate from the app's cache. When the app updates, only the old application files are cleared, not your personal data. Your progress is always safe and will be here every time you return.
